name: Albedo's Alchemy Lab [Prototype]
description:
This is a Genshin Impact fan-game about the character Albedo, The Chalk Prince. I own nothing and all creative rights go to Mihoyo. 

In this game, you just kinda walk around a simulated laboratory as Albedo. At the moment, there isn't a lot to do. However, there are quite a bit of secrets that are in-laid within the game if you can find them.

I'm currently doing this game as a sort of a little fun side-project so it's future development is undetermined. That being said, if you have any suggestions and whatnot for this game, I'll be sure to keep it consideration when updating the game.

I don't really have anything interesting left to say other than to be sure to carefully read the download instructions, and have a good one!

P.S. You don't need to pay for the game, at the download part, you can just click  "No thanks, just take me to the downloads".

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys = Move
  • Escape =Escape current window/instance
  • Everything else is more or less explanatory
